requirements.summary: Fix the Contact page (India Support Contact) email text and mailto link to use awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com exactly.
acceptanceCriteria: On /contact, the displayed email text is "awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com" (no typos).
On /contact, clicking the email link uses href="mailto:awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com".
No phone number is added to the Contact page.

file_operations.description: Update the email anchor so both the visible email text and the href mailto value are exactly "awarenessoveraddictionofficial@gmail.com" (fixing the current misspelling), without adding any phone number or changing the Instagram link/text.
